snippet: Next Generation Caterers in the Bronx helps the young adults who serve as interns in their quest for jobs and self-reliance.
abstract: Children’s Aid Society operates Next Generation Caterers in the Bronx, professional kitchen and facility that helps young adult interns prepare for jobs and self-reliance; Neediest Cases Fund supplies application fee for Lester Amaya, Brandon Colon and Nestor Martinez as they prepare to get certified in food safety.
lead_paragraph: Next Generation Caterers in the Bronx helps the young adults who serve as interns in their quest for jobs and self-reliance.

headline.main: Seeking Independence, Three Men Start in the Kitchen
headline.print_headline: Seeking Independence, Three Men Start in the Kitchen
